author: Thorin Klosowski
title: Locate a Lost Roku Remote By Pressing a Button On the Roku Box
text:
Ever lost the remote to your Roku device? How-To Geek reminds us that you can sound an alarm on the remote by pressing a button on the Roku itself. Advertisement 
This only works on the Roku 4 and Roku Ultra . On the Roku box, there’s a small button that sort of looks like a remote. Press that button, and your remote will start beeping. Chance are you’ve already noticed this button when you were setting up your Roku, but unless you actually look at that little box often, it’s easy to forget about this feature. You can also change the sound effect by heading to Settings > Remote on your Roku.
